title: Perma ban Skarsgard !
body: They perma banned me because I flamed players ! I played Vayne on bot and I got Veigar as a support, whole game stealing a farm, Lucian top who had 0/2 in 5 min, and JARVAN IV who didn't come even  once in 17 min to gank, and he started to talking about my farm... VEIGAR STOLE MY ALL FARM and when I said i will report u Veigar for stealing a farm, Jarvan said so what, he is better than u. Whole game provocated and when I respond to them, RIOT gave me perma ban. I've been playing this game for 5 years and can't get promote in bigger division because of players like them. I said, just go in my games and watch what's happening and all would be clear. Everyone has been starting to provocate and flame, and when i respond them, they report me and then RIOT gave me ban or restrictions, but when I report them, nothing is happen. I admit it that i flame them, but just look when, when they start first and when they are unskilled players for ranked games ! 5 YEARS AND CAN'T GET OUT OF SILVER because of low players. That's unfair, every normal player will flame that he is in situation like me. Give me another chance RIOT !! I spent a lot of time and money on this game and I think i deserve another chance. I'll shut my mouth from now, but u also have to look on what they talk to me at first. Good regards !

replies.body:
http://eune.op.gg/summoner/userName=Skarsgard

Veigar literally had 6  farm at 12 minutes. "Stealing all my farm" lol ok
Mate go in that game and see what happened. Touching farm and when creeps are low, only Q them. I said don't do that, he continued. Im not a idiot.

Gotta stop being so easily manipulated. Try to keep your cool and dont let people bait you into getting your self banned. They cant just allow retaliation like that when we have rules like we do. That would be absolute chaos. The second someone deems it as "provoking", everyone is suddenly able to type all the shit they want even though its against the rules? Nah, Riot wouldnt allow that. Sucks it was a permaban dude. I was gonna say at least you know how it works now, but I guess that was the hardest way to learn. Fuckin Rito and their social engineering.

I left so much money on this game man on this account, I gave 5 years also on this and I think I won't play this game anymore because it's unfair...I don't want to make another acc cuz i don't have a nerves for buying new champs and skins, and other things.

It is not unfair, chat restrictions and temporary suspensions are all huge red flags indicating that whatever you are saying and/or doing in game has to change, the reform card that appears when you have been given 14 day suspension clearly states that this is your last chance to do so,

Good luck in Future games (if you choose to play after this) 
Keep it cool, Don't let people get to you-

Ya I feel you. I would probably stop too. Hopefully you got some other games youre interested in. I play alot of Starcraft 2. More than this game.

You had multiple chances to reform. You must have gone through multiple chat restrictions and a 14-day suspension in order to get a permanent ban (exceptions). As Projective Vomit said, you are responsible for the things you say. If they are provoking you, ignore/mute them. There is no need for you to respond.
So that's it, I can't get unban anymore ?  There is no chance ?

> [{quoted}](name=Skarsgard,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xArms0Hy,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-12-13T00:14:19.882+0000)
>
> So that's it, I can't get unban anymore ?  There is no chance ?

Unfortunately, once you are permanently banned, you will not be unbanned. If you ever have any questions regarding your ban (and not to complain about other players causing your ban), you can always send a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to Riot Support.
No matter what anyone on your team did or said, you are responsible for the things you say.

That's true, I 100% agree with u man, but RIOT have to look what did they say to me. I admit that I flamed them, and I regret but just need to see provocations by them. That can't be showed here. Just for know, I reported them but obviously nothing...

If they grief and/or troll games on a regular basis, they will get suspended eventually, Don't worry.

If you create/have any other accounts, make it a habit to never use chat unless you are going to say something positive or strat related
(there really are no other reasons to use it)

Things tend to be a lot more enjoyable that way

League is for nice players, and we don't want people who are mean. Be the good guy and ignore the trolls. You and the others that follow that advise wont become a part of the problem of the toxic community. Therefore, more nice people to play with instead of mean trolls!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Bye.

you chose to get permbanned.
